mapper.select:
SELECT dr.`id`,dr.`driving_record`,dr.`license_num`,dr.`lane_num`,dr.`entrance_time`,dr.`exit_time`, dr.`entrance_name`,dr.`exit_name`,dr.`create_time`,dr.`mileage`,dr.`equipment_number`, dr.`export_longitude`, dr.`export_latitudes`,dr.`entrance_longitude`, dr.`entrance_latitudes`
FROM `driving_license` dl, `driving_record` dr WHERE dl.`customer_id`=#{customerId} and dl.`license_num`=dr.`license_num` AND dr.entrance_name!='暂无数据' ORDER BY entrance_time DESC
